name: silk rug - sandytoes2211
description:
who is sandytoes2211? a bonakdar
born in tehran, iran. 
both parents born in Mashhad (Persian: مشهد‎) # مشهدي
some people are born with a silver spoon in their mouth, i was born on an old silk persian rug. well sort of, since my mom technically gave birth to me in the hospital. this was somewhat unusual in our strict islamic family. my dad lost his mom when he was 5 because she slipped and fell on ice. she bled to death overnight, after a miss-carriage as she refused doctor care and no one took her. times changed.
bonakdar means wholesaler of textiles and my dad’s many brothers were and are international persian rug merchants.
